title: Rough Ride
description: Buckle up, Kate, it's going to be a rough ride.MALCOLMI've wanted Kate since I first laid eyes on her, which is insane--she's half my age and my employee, but I can't stop wanting her. Needing her.And when she accidentally discovers my dirty little secret, I have no reason to do the right thing anymore. So I'm going to make her mine in every sense of the word.KATEI had a crappy 21st birthday, and now I've got the hangover from hell. To make matters worse, I have an early morning meeting with my overbearing,pain-in-ass boss, Malcolm York. Instead of using my internship to learn about the ad business, I'm Malcolm's personal assistant. Assistant? Errand girl, more like.But when I discover what he's been hiding, all bets are off.Rough Ride is a steamy, Â kinky office romance with a panty-melting alpha hero, and a satisfying HEA.The Ride Series is about four best friends (Kate, Poppy, Darcy, and Iris) who are about to graduate from college. They've vowed to have one last gasp, before adulting for real. Each of them is at a crossroads in life. Where will the road ahead lead?
author: Cynthia Rayne
